Title: Includes policies and procedures for responding to students having mental health crises in school safety plans
Summary: Includes policies and procedures for responding to students having mental health crises in a manner that does not include contacting law enforcement unless implied or direct threats of violence or other criminal activity is involved in school safety plans.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to including policies and procedures for responding to students having mental health crises in school safety plans
